title: Florentine spinach and ricotta lasagne rolls
ingredients: ['8 lasagne sheets', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '300g frozen chopped spinach', '2 tablespoons thinly sliced spring onion', '575g reduced fat ricotta cheese', '1 1/2 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 egg', '600g shop-bought white lasagne sauce', '110g grated mozzarella cheese']
